job_details.Vacaturetitel: Patient monitoring R&D Engineer / Project manager
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You are responsible for design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions, which are deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings. Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies for 20-40% of time.
   Your role:
     * Design and develop (AI/ML-based) algorithms which touch more than 600 000 patients annually.
     * Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation in the field of vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction
     * Lead projects and manage programs to develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions using lates technologies such as generative AI
     * Join the winning team of Hospital Patient Monitoring, in particular the Data & AI R&D team who works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams of Hospital Patient Monitoring business
     * Learn how to develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions which make a real difference in healthcare - improve outcomes and reduce costs.
     * Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader, selecting between enormous opportunities Philips offers to grow your career. We offer a flexible work schedule, hybrid way of working, and access to local well-being focused activities.
job_details.full_text:
Patient monitoring R&D Engineer / Project manager

You are responsible for design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions, which are deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings. Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies for 20-40% of time.
   Your role:
     * Design and develop (AI/ML-based) algorithms which touch more than 600 000 patients annually.
     * Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation in the field of vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction
     * Lead projects and manage programs to develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions using lates technologies such as generative AI
     * Join the winning team of Hospital Patient Monitoring, in particular the Data & AI R&D team who works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams of Hospital Patient Monitoring business
     * Learn how to develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions which make a real difference in healthcare - improve outcomes and reduce costs.
     * Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader, selecting between enormous opportunities Philips offers to grow your career. We offer a flexible work schedule, hybrid way of working, and access to local well-being focused activities.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the design and development of algorithms, particularly ML/AI-based solutions for patient monitoring and risk prediction. While generative AI is mentioned, the core focus is on predictive modeling and applying these to medical data, aligning with the definition and evidence profile of an ML Engineer. The project management aspect is secondary and integrated with the development of these solutions.

job_tasks.justification: The job involves designing and developing ML/AI-based algorithms for patient measurement, management, vital signs analysis, and risk prediction, which are core modeling activities.
job_tasks.phrase: design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions

job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions designing and developing AI/ML-based algorithms.
Staying updated with AI innovations in vital signs analysis and risk prediction is crucial for model development.
job_tasks.phrase: Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation in the field of vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction

job_tasks.justification: Leading projects and managing programs for developing AI-based solutions implies software development lifecycle management and integration.
job_tasks.phrase: Lead projects and manage programs to develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'generative AI' in the context of developing solutions suggests involvement in building applications that utilize these models, which falls under software development.
job_tasks.phrase: using lates technologies such as generative AI

job_tasks.justification: Developing 'medical-grade solutions' implies building robust, safe, and reliable software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions

job_tasks.justification: The role is situated within a business context ('Hospital Patient Monitoring business') and requires collaboration with clinical and marketing teams, indicating a need to understand business needs and translate them.
job_tasks.phrase: Join the winning team of Hospital Patient Monitoring, in particular the Data & AI R&D team who works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams of Hospital Patient Monitoring business

job_tasks.justification: The responsibility for deploying solutions that impact a large number of patients annually implies a need for production-grade systems and maintenance, aligning with MLOps principles.
job_tasks.phrase: deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings.

job_tasks.justification: Project management responsibility, even if partial, requires understanding project goals, timelines, and resource allocation within a business context.
job_tasks.phrase: Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies

soft_skills.phrase: Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader, selecting between enormous opportunities Philips offers to grow your career.
Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader, selecting between enormous opportunities Philips offers to grow your career.
works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams
